member.name: M:Terra.ViewModels.GraphicalPlantViewModel.AddDataPoint(System.Int32,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{LiveChartsCore.Defaults.ObservableValue})
member.summary: main: Add data point to line chart | explaination: Every line chart can show seven points at a time. With every extra point, we remove the oldest point (first point) in the chart, offset all points' position by minus one, then add the newest point at the end of the chart.
member.param: Data point to be added.
Target line chart.
